Properties.ProtectedString:
function WaitForChild(parent, child) while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[child] end
local FROG_ASSET_ID = 106808835 local GLib = require(206209239)
local Handle = script.Parent local Tool = Handle.Parent local Character local Humanoid local SludgeMesh = WaitForChild(Tool, "SludgeMesh") local FrogScript = WaitForChild(Handle, "FrogScript")
local SludgeSound = WaitForChild(Handle, 'Sludge') local MagicSound = WaitForChild(Handle, 'Magic')
local charWelds = {}
function saveWelds(model, weldTable) if model:IsA("JointInstance") then weldTable[model] = model.Parent end for _, v in pairs(model:GetChildren()) do saveWelds(v, weldTable) end end
function storeWelds(char) charWelds[char] = {} saveWelds(char, charWelds[char]) end
function returnWelds(char) for weld, weldParent in pairs(charWelds[char]) do weld.Parent = weldParent end end
function removeToolsFromChar(char) local charParts = char:GetChildren() for i = 1, #charParts do if charParts[i]:IsA("Tool") then charParts[i]:Remove() end end end
local InsertedFrog = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(FROG_ASSET_ID) local Froggy if InsertedFrog then Froggy = InsertedFrog:GetChildren()[1] end
--local Froggy = workspace.Froggy
function transformPlayer(player) --[[ local newFroggy = Froggy:Clone() local newFrogScript = FrogScript:Clone() local oldCharacter = player.Character
newFroggy:TranslateBy(oldCharacter:GetModelCFrame().p - newFroggy:GetModelCFrame().p) storeWelds(oldCharacter) oldCharacter.Parent = nil newFroggy.Parent = workspace player.Character = newFroggy newFrogScript.Parent = newFroggy newFrogScript.Disabled = false
wait(20) newFroggy.Parent = nil returnWelds(oldCharacter) removeToolsFromChar(oldCharacter) oldCharacter.Parent = workspace player.Character = oldCharacter --]]
local new = Instance.new'Part' new.Name = 'Frog' new.CanCollide = false new.Locked = true new.FormFactor = 'Custom' new.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) local mesh = script.FrogMesh:Clone() mesh.Parent = new local newScript = FrogScript:Clone()
new:MakeJoints() local char = player.Character if char:FindFirstChild'Frog' then return end
new.Parent = char newScript.Parent = char newScript.Disabled = false local w = Instance.new('Weld') w.Part0 = char.HumanoidRootPart w.Part1 = new w.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -3+1/2+0.05, 0) w.Parent = new
local original = {} do for i,v in next, GLib.GetDescendants(char) do if v:IsA'BasePart' and v~=new then original[v] = { Transparency = v.Transparency }
v.Transparency = 1 elseif v:IsA'Decal' then original[v] = { Transparency = v.Transparency }
v.Transparency = 1 elseif v:IsA'Fire' or v:IsA'Sparkles' or v:IsA'Smoke' then original[v] = { Enabled = v.Enabled }
v.Enabled = false end end end
wait(20) new:Destroy()
for v, p in next, original do for i,n in next, p do v[i] = n end end newScript:Destroy() end
local playersToTransform = {} function checkForEnemy(foundParts) local currTime = tick() for i = 1, #foundParts do local char = foundParts[i].Parent if char and char ~= Character and char.Name ~= "Froggy" then local player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(char) if player and (not playersToTransform[player] or currTime - playersToTransform[player] > 10) then playersToTransform[player] = tick() delay(0, function() transformPlayer(player) end) end end end end
function doSludge(sludge, sludgeMesh) local timeWaited = 0 while timeWaited < 1 do timeWaited = timeWaited + wait() sludge.CFrame = sludge.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/15, 0) end local foundParts = workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(sludge.CFrame.p - Vector3.new(1.5, .1, 1.5), sludge.CFrame.p + Vector3.new(1.5, 3, 1.5)), nil, 30)
SludgeSound:Play() checkForEnemy(foundParts)
local startCFrame = sludge.CFrame timeWaited = 0 while timeWaited < .5 do timeWaited = timeWaited + 3*wait() sludge.CFrame = startCFrame + Vector3.new(0, timeWaited*10, 0) sludgeMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(3, timeWaited*20, -3) end
foundParts = workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(sludge.CFrame.p - Vector3.new(1.5, 5, 1.5), sludge.CFrame.p + Vector3.new(1.5, 5, 1.5)), nil, 30)
checkForEnemy(foundParts)
while timeWaited > 0 do timeWaited = timeWaited - 2*wait() sludge.CFrame = startCFrame + Vector3.new(0, timeWaited*10, 0) sludgeMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(3, timeWaited*20, -3) end
sludge:Remove() end
Tool.Enabled = false function onActivated(hit) if not Humanoid or Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = true MagicSound:Play() local newSludge = Instance.new("Part") newSludge.formFactor = "Custom" newSludge.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) newSludge.Reflectance = .01 newSludge.Material = "Ice" newSludge.TopSurface = "Smooth" newSludge.BottomSurface = "Smooth" newSludge.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Br. yellowish green") newSludge.CanCollide = false newSludge.Anchored = true newSludge.CFrame = CFrame.new(hit.p + Vector3.new(0, .25, 0))
local newSludgeMesh = SludgeMesh:Clone() newSludgeMesh.Parent = newSludge
newSludge.Parent = workspace delay(0, function() doSludge(newSludge, newSludgeMesh) end)
wait(.5) Tool.Enabled = false end
function onEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
--Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Input.OnServerEvent:connect(function(client, action, ...) if client.Character == Tool.Parent then if action == 'Mouse1' then local down, hit = ...
if down then onActivated(hit) end end end end) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)

function WaitForChild(parent, child) while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[child] end
local Character = script.Parent local Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) local Mouse = Player:GetMouse()
local Torso = WaitForChild(Character, "Torso") local Neck = WaitForChild(Torso, "Neck") local Humanoid = WaitForChild(Character, "Humanoid")
local NeckAngle = 0
local CroakSound = WaitForChild(script, 'Croak') spawn(function() CroakSound.Parent = Torso end) local JumpHumanoid = false local keysDown = {}
local lastSpace = 0 function onKeyDown(key) key = key:lower() if key == " " then local currTime = tick() if currTime - lastSpace > 2 then lastSpace = currTime NeckAngle = NeckAngle + math.pi*2 --Neck.DesiredAngle = NeckAngle end elseif key == "w" or key == "a" or key == "s" or key == "d" or (string.byte(key) == 17 and string.byte(key) == 18) then lastSpace = tick() keysDown[key] = true JumpHumanoid = true end end
function onKeyUp(key) key = key:lower() if key == "w" or key == "a" or key == "s" or key == "d" or (string.byte(key) == 17 and string.byte(key) == 18) then keysDown[key] = nil local stopJumping = true for _, __ in pairs(keysDown) do stopJumping = false end if stopJumping then JumpHumanoid = false end end end
Mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(onKeyUp)
local soundDebounce = false while true do if JumpHumanoid then if not soundDebounce then soundDebounce = true CroakSound:Play() delay(1, function() soundDebounce = false end) end Humanoid.Jump = true end wait() end

function WaitForChild(parent, child) while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[child] end
local Handle = script.Parent local Tool = Handle.Parent local Humanoid local Animation
local animation = WaitForChild(Tool, "wandcast")
function onEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Animation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(animation) end
local wasEnabled = false function onChanged() -- A prime example of garbage. if Tool.Enabled and not wasEnabled then wasEnabled = true Animation = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild'Humanoid' and Tool.Parent.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(animation)
if Animation then Animation:Play() end elseif not Tool.Enabled and wasEnabled then wasEnabled = false end end
function onUnequipped() if Animation then Animation:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(onChanged) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
